content: forest fog cowl is a very quick and easy it uses only two basic crochet stitches chain and single_crochet us terms and even if you are a complete beginner in crochet you will handle it this cowl is ideal to practice basic crochet skills on and to learn how to keep the gauge under control using bulky thick yarn you will make a new cowl for yourself or your friends in no time using 2 skeins of stonewashed xl and 1 skein of maxima or vinci you can make one cowl 24 cm x 114 cm to wear with two layers or 2 cowls 24 cm x 57 cm one-layerd
